Automatically approve all submissions vi: Automatically approve all submissions via Affiliate Registration Form - no manual review needed.
Users with these roles automatically bec: Users with these roles automatically become affiliates.
All products are eligible for affiliate: All products are eligible for affiliate commission by default. If you want to exclude some, list them here.
Allow affiliates to use something other: Allow affiliates to use something other than {user_id} as referral identifier.
Use coupons for referral - along with af: Use coupons for referral - along with affiliated links
Use 0 for session only referrals. Use 36: Use 0 for session only referrals. Use 36500 for 100 year / lifetime referrals. If someone makes a purchase within these many days of their first referred visit, affiliate will be credited for the sale.
Allow affiliates to receive lifetime com: Allow affiliates to receive lifetime commissions
Affiliates will receive commissions for: Affiliates will receive commissions for every sale made by the same customer linked to this affiliate - without using referral link or coupon.
Exclude the affiliates either by individ: Exclude the affiliates either by individual affiliate tags to not give them lifetime commissions.
Allow affiliates to earn commissions on: Allow affiliates to earn commissions on their own orders
Disabling this will not record a commiss: Disabling this will not record a commission if an affiliate uses their own referral link/coupons during orders
Include affiliate referral details in th: Include affiliate referral details in the WooCommerce New order, WooCommerce Subscriptions New Renewal Order & Subscription Switched emails (if enabled).
Disabling this will not include affiliat: Disabling this will not include affiliate referral details in the email to admin.
Leaving this blank will use default valu: Leaving this blank will use default value ref
Exclude the affiliates either by individ: Exclude the affiliates either by individual affiliate user to not give them lifetime commissions.
Your submitted form is under review. Ple: Your submitted form is under review. Please wait for confirmation.
Please be an affiliate user for unlock a: Please be an affiliate user for unlock affiliate feature.
all matching products in the order: all matching products in the order
And then, for remaining products in the: And then, for remaining products in the order
